question: 弱い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>weak</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>weak</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: 

You just got beaten up because you're <vocabulary>weak</vocabulary>. Then the bully asks you: "<reading>Yo! Why</reading> (<ja>よわ</ja>) you so weak?"
